issue.title: [CF 944] Hardcode in some spells that aren't actually spellstealable
issue.body:
From http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/forum/mage/48109-show-any-spellstealable-buffs-on-your-target/#p4

Since Blizzard is unlikely to ever fix it, I will hardcode in a few exceptions for things that are marked as spellstealable, but actually aren't. So far all I have is Iceblock. I don't play a mage, so I don't notice other spells that might also be incorrectly flagged, although I suspect pally bubble is also guilty of this.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #944 | Raw

comments.body:
Done in g70f6be5


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
